onlineAddresses.caption: Cheddar News: Stella Artois, Zed Run Partner to Bring Digital Horse Racing NFT to Auction
Adweek: This Woman Is Merging Entertainment and Web3, Despite the ‘Dude-Bro’ Crypto World
Adweek: 22 LGBTQ+ Changemakers Creating More Inclusive Spaces
Lindsey McInerney: The Open vs. Closed Metaverse
Lindsey McInerney: Why Now is the Right Time for the Metaverse

speakerTopic.text:
Brands are rushing to figure out how to incorporate the metaverse, Web3, and NFTs into their marketing campaigns and Lindsey McInerney is here to help. From building hyper-growth startups to advising Fortune 500 companies, Lindsey is responsible for launching some of the world’s most recognizable brands into the metaverse.

Recognizing that many are uncertain or even downright skeptical, Lindsey will examine the facts vs. fads when it comes to the metaverse as well as the case studies that show what makes Web3 marketing so enticing.
speakerTopic.title: The Future of Marketing: Exploring The Facts vs. Fads

speakerTopic.text:
For Lindsey McInerney, being a queer woman in tech has meant carving her own path and disrupting from day one. While the challenge has not always been easy, she considers seeing the world through different eyes to be her superpower.

Today, many companies recognize this and are focused on increasing diversity in their organizations. While this is exactly the way to build a highly successful company, Lindsey explains why this effort alone isn't what will keep rock star talent at your business. In this conversation, Lindsey teaches audiences what it takes to build a diverse and inclusive company where talent thrives.
speakerTopic.title: Why Diversity & Inclusion in Tech is Just the Beginning

speakerTopic.text:
The term "metaverse" comes from dystopian fiction, but is that really where we are headed? Before the metaverse and Web3, there was Web 2.0 which changed the way we use the internet completely and birthed the biggest tech giants yet. Web3, however, promises to bring a shift even more seismic than the one that gave us Facebook, Airbnb, and Netflix. 

In this conversation, Futurist and Web3 Thought Leader Lindsey McInerney teaches audiences what to expect in this next iteration of the mobile web. As we move toward a more immersive digital future, she explains what is happening, how we got here, and why this is happening now. Most importantly, audiences will learn what it all means for them personally and for their businesses by understanding the obstacles and opportunities it will create and how it will help to solve the biggest problems created by Web 2.0.
speakerTopic.title: Our Digital Future: Exploring the Metaverse & Web3

speakerTopic.text:
The Bitcoin whitepaper, the thesis paper that set the basic structure of the electronic currency, was published in October 2008 and started a massive global movement. Today, when people think of Crypto, they usually think of currencies and while this is where crypto started, it is certainly not where crypto ends. 

In this conversation, Lindsey McInerney teaches audiences why crypto should be viewed much more like software than a currency and why it's the future of technology.
speakerTopic.title: Cryptocurrency: The Future of Technology

speakerTopic.text:
Humans are collectors. We are creators. We are consumers. NFTs (non-fungible tokens) have created the ability to replicate some of our most human behaviors digitally and create new business models on the internet. 

In this conversation, Lindsey McInerney teaches audiences what makes digital ownership via NFTs so unique and how NFTs unlock a multi-trillion-dollar economy.
speakerTopic.title: NFTs: The Keys to a Multi-Trillion Dollar Economy

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Lindsey McInerney is a tech futurist and thought leader consumed by the possibilities of Web 3.0 and metaverse.
  • She is co-founder and CEO of 6th Wall, a blockchain entertainment company that serves as the digital arm of Mila Kunis' Orchard Farm Productions.
  • Lindsey was honored as one of Adweek's Pride Stars for her work in making Web3 a more inclusive space for the queer community. 
  • She formerly served as Head of Technology and Innovation globally at Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world's largest brewer.
  • She executed one of the first major brand executions in the space, a Cannes Lion award-nominated campaign that put Stella Artois on the map as the first beer brand and FMCG company in the metaverse. 
  • She focuses on the intersection of technologies that will bring Web 3.0 and metaverse to life, including blockchain, crypto, NFTs, and XR.
  • Lindsey has spent her career building startups globally and has driven early digital adoption at multiple Fortune 500 companies, advising them on how best to embrace emerging technology.

speakerBiography.text:
Lindsey McInerney is a leader in web3, a space set to be the successor of our current internet. She is co-founder and CEO of Sixth Wall, a blockchain entertainment company that serves as the digital arm of Mila Kunis' Orchard Farm Productions.

She has been named one of 'The 30 Most Influential People in the Metaverse,' as well as one of 'The Most Prominent Digital Futurists to Watch Out For in 2022,' alongside Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin and Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg. An early internet nerd and tech futurist, Lindsey is consumed by the emergence of the metaverse, and excited about the ways crypto, blockchain, gaming, NFTs, and XR will change our current digital and physical landscape.  

As the former Global Head of Technology and Innovation at AB InBev, the world's largest brewer, she launched Stella Artois into the metaverse in an explosive partnership with ZED RUN, a crypto horse racing game. One of the first major brand executions in the space, the Cannes Lion award-nominated campaign put Stella Artois on the map as the first beer brand and FMCG company in the metaverse and was well received by traditional and crypto media alike. 

Whether building hyper-growth startups or advising Fortune 500 companies, the Royal Family, or the United Nations, Lindsey has spent her career helping people understand the impact of evolving technologies and adopt them early. She speaks regularly at conferences and is sought out as a thought leader on topics ranging from crypto, NFTs, metaverse, AR, VR, XR, and web3. 

Originally from Toronto, Canada, Lindsey is currently collecting jpegs on the blockchain, meeting friends in 3D worlds, and keeping sheep out of her garden in the countryside of England where she resides with her partner and dog.
